data.title: Profitable High End HMI Device Manufacturer, Fortune 500 Clients
data.meta_description: This profitable high-end human machine interface device manufacturer is positioned as a leader in precision commercial and defense joysticks. Their product caters to a range of applications, including: ROV/UAV control, payload control and simulators. The company has had a successful track record for over 30 years. They are AS9100D and ISO9001 certified, therefore they can meet wide range compliance requirements of the industries they operate in.  They have gained reputation with major Fortune-500 clients and have earned single source positions with industry-leading customers in defense, high tech, and oil & gas sectors. The business is insulated from single-sector fluctuations due to their diverse customer base. The company is well aligned with high growth DoD priorities and emerging technological trends. The founders have decades of aerospace technology experience and are committed towards a seamless transition with ongoing support.
data.text:
This profitable high-end human machine interface device manufacturer is positioned as a leader in precision commercial and defense joysticks. Their product caters to a range of applications, including: ROV/UAV control, payload control and simulators. The company has had a successful track record for over 30 years. They are AS9100D and ISO9001 certified, therefore they can meet wide range compliance requirements of the industries they operate in.

They have gained reputation with major Fortune-500 clients and have earned single source positions with industry-leading customers in defense, high tech, and oil & gas sectors. The business is insulated from single-sector fluctuations due to their diverse customer base. The company is well aligned with high growth DoD priorities and emerging technological trends. The founders have decades of aerospace technology experience and are committed towards a seamless transition with ongoing support.
